name: Kyrylo Dubovyk
title: AI Solutions Architect at Big Sister AI | AI Engineer at Keer LAB | Data Engineer | LLM Agents | LLMOps
summary: I am an AI Engineer and AI Solutions Architect at Big Sister AI with extensive experience in designing, developing, and deploying advanced AI systems and large language model (LLM) applications. I specialize in bridging the gap between cutting-edge AI research and production-level solutions, ensuring that prototypes mature into scalable, efficient, and reliable systems. My technical expertise covers the entire lifecycle of AI solutions. I excel in prompt engineering—applying chain-of-thought, few-shot, zero-shot, role-based, and context-based techniques—to create effective, efficient prompts that drive performance. I also possess strong skills in Python, JSON, Markdown, and Jinja, which are integral to building consistent outputs and templated reporting.

experience.title: AI Solutions Architect
experience.description: Collaborated with stakeholders to understand business objectives and user requirements, gathering and analyzing data to identify key performance indicators and success metrics. Translated business and stakeholder needs into technical specifications, defining both functional and non-functional requirements for AI and data systems. Documented and confirmed requirements with stakeholders to ensure alignment. Identified and evaluated appropriate AI and data engineering tools and technologies to meet system requirements, performing cost/benefit analysis to select the most effective solutions. Prototyped and tested AI models and data pipelines, ensuring alignment with stakeholder needs. Negotiated with top-tier platforms (AWS, Google, Azure, Snowflake) to discuss demands and find the best solutions. Developed and deployed AI models and data engineering pipelines, continuously monitoring and evaluating system performance. Iterated on the design and implementation based on feedback and performance metrics.

experience.title: Prompt Engineer
experience.description: As a dedicated AI Engineer specializing in Prompt Engineering at Big Sister AI, I employ advanced methodologies to develop and implement effective AI prompts ensuring predictive and consistent results. I excel in crafting scalable solutions that tailor AI behavior and responses to meet stringent production-grade requirements while fostering deep collaborative relationships with stakeholders. Key Responsibilities: Prompt Development in AI Engineering, Core Design, Methodologies Employed (One-shot Learning, Few-shot Learning, Zero-shot Learning, Template Engineering, Fine-tuning), Evaluation & Optimization, Prototype Engineering, and Stakeholder Collaboration.

experience.title: Senior Business Development Manager
experience.description: Led product development resulting in a platform that reduces clients' customer acquisition costs by an average of 45%. Directed a strategy overhaul that propelled a user base increase of 150% within the first five months of operation.

experience.title: AI Prompt Engineer & No-Code Development Lead
experience.description: Developed AI agents for research, customer support, and sales management, incorporating custom functions that expanded AI agent capabilities. Launched an innovative AI agent that, in a single prompt, collects comprehensive LinkedIn profile information, conducts internet searches for additional insights, and generates a JSON report for efficient downstream processing. Steered the strategic roadmap and product development at AutoSynthIQ, my venture, ensuring a 45% decrease in customer acquisition costs and a 150% increase in our user base over five months. Leveraged No-Code automation and advanced Python scripting to facilitate API integrations, enhancing CRM systems and streamlining business workflows. Mentored and led diverse teams, fostering an environment of growth and continuous learning in cutting-edge AI technologies and No-Code solutions.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: At the helm of AutoSynthIQ, I spearhead a team dedicated to reinventing the marketing landscape through innovative automation and AI-driven insights. Our platform is meticulously engineered to bolster efficiency and definitively reduce customer acquisition costs. Leadership & Strategy, Product Development, Customer Success, Brand Expansion, Technology Integration, Data Security & Compliance, Growth & Networks.

experience.title: Sales Director
experience.description: As the Sales Director at Griffin | Facility Management, I led a collaborative team to establish a sales department from scratch during challenging times. Together, we achieved impressive results: Strategic Vision, Team Empowerment, Operational Efficiency, Innovation, Market Insights, Effective Marketing, Financial Expertise. Engineered a sales department founding strategy that doubled revenue from 60 to 120 million within a year, exceeding industry averages by 20%.

experience.title: Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: Scaled the start-up to a revenue of 12 million UAH in the first year, surpassing average industry growth rates by 25%. Spearheaded the creation and launch of KidWay, overseeing progress from ideation to operational success. Developed and executed a coherent product concept, ensuring that all aspects of the business align with strategic goals. Established the organizational structure, successfully assembling a cross-functional team of 10 professionals, driving the company culture for peak performance. Implemented cutting-edge management methodologies and best practices, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and agility. Executed strategic financial planning and developed robust reporting systems, providing insightful data for informed decision-making. Championed project management during challenging times, identifying new opportunities to pivot and sustain growth. Created and executed a visionary marketing strategy, integrating digital platforms such as email marketing and social media to maximize outreach and engagement. Implemented CRM and ERP systems that increased operational efficiency, leading to an impressive customer retention rate of 85%.

experience.title: Head Of Sales
experience.description: As Sales Director during an expansive phase at Vema Kids, I led multiple initiatives to scale the company's growth and solidify its market leadership in educational equipment. Managed and optimized a sales team of 40+ members, facilitating a 25% YOY revenue increase by implementing strategic sales techniques and customer engagement models. Instrumental in maintaining the company's revenue growth, contributing to the upwards trend from $3 million to $10 million within the period adjacent to my tenure. Improved CRM system functionality leading to a 15% increase in customer retention and a 20% boost in sales efficiency. Aided in the digital marketing strategy that saw website traffic increase by 50% and online sales surge, accounting for 33% of the total sales volume.

faqs.question: What are Kyrylo's areas of expertise?
faqs.answer: Kyrylo specializes in AI Solutions Architecture, Prompt Engineering, AI Agent Development, No-Code/Low-Code Automation, Data Engineering, and Cloud Infrastructure. He has extensive experience with LLMs, particularly OpenAI's GPT models, and is skilled in Python, TypeScript, and various cloud platforms including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

faqs.question: What is Kyrylo's professional background?
faqs.answer: Kyrylo is currently an AI Solutions Architect at Big Sister AI and an AI Engineer at Keer LAB. Previously, he was a Prompt Engineer at Big Sister AI, co-founded AutoSynthIQ, served as Sales Director at Griffin | Facility Management, was CEO of KidWay, and Head of Sales at Vema Kids. He has a Master's degree in Project Management from the National University of Shipbuilding.

faqs.question: What services does Kyrylo offer?
faqs.answer: Kyrylo offers AI Solutions Architecture, Prompt Engineering, AI Agent Development, No-Code/Low-Code Automation, AI Business Consulting, and Data Engineering services. He specializes in designing and implementing comprehensive AI systems, developing effective prompts for LLMs, creating specialized AI agents, implementing automation solutions, providing strategic guidance on AI implementation, and designing data pipelines and storage solutions.

faqs.question: What are some of Kyrylo's notable achievements?
faqs.answer: Kyrylo has developed AI agents for research, customer support, and sales management; launched an innovative AI agent for LinkedIn profile information collection; reduced clients' customer acquisition costs by 45% at AutoSynthIQ; increased user base by 150% within five months; improved lead generation quality by 60%; doubled revenue from 60 to 120 million within a year at Griffin | Facility Management; scaled KidWay to 12 million UAH revenue in the first year; and managed a sales team of 40+ members at Vema Kids, facilitating a 25% YOY revenue increase.
